President @fhollande strongly and indignantly denounces the terrorist act in a discotheque in Istanbul https://t.co/BBOrKf3Csl
# Jordan condemns the terrorist operation in Istanbul # https://t.co/xQkz8Gmier # Turkey
I strongly condemn the terrorist attack that took place in Istanbul's Ortaköy district in the first hours of 2017.
My citizens who lost their lives in aggression want Allah's mercy, I remember with compassion our lost foreign guests.
The brutal assault in Istanbul made it clear that terrorism aims to infiltrate blood, to take life, to hurt life without discrimination.
We will never pass through these dirty games by keeping our coolness and mating with each other.
The start of 2017 has been terrible in Istanbul. We live intensely and have transferred our condolences to the Turkish government.
Turkey, which continues the struggle for terrorism, is determined to do what is necessary to ensure the security and peace of its citizens.
On the first day of the new year I condemn the terror attack and the mentality behind this pain and sorrow.
Wishing all my friends and family a very happy new year 2017.  May you and your families enjoy best of health and happiness. #maldives.
Tragic start in 2017. My thoughts on the first day of the year are with the survivors after the sweep attack in #Istanbul

President @fhollande is today in Iraq to salute the Iraqi commitment against Daesh in Mosul and meet the French forces
He also comes to highlight the important progress made since his visit to Baghdad on September 12, 2014
President @fhollande has just landed at Baghdad airport https://t.co/56k9FA3Rmu
This move is part of the commitment of @fhollande for the stability of the region and the fight against terrorism ... https://t.co/48yIoSRUXm
President @fhollande meets the detachments Monsabert and Narvik. This one ensures the formation of the forces will ... https://t.co/5HLbm6RsNK
The Iraqi Counter Terrorism Service (ICTS), the Iraqi equivalent of the Special Forces, is currently engaged in the fighting in Mosul
The mission of TF Monsabert is to train and advise the staff of the 6th Iraqi Infantry Division which protects Baghdad
To date, 6,130 Iraqi soldiers have been trained by the French military since March 2015.
The Chammal operation is based on two pillars: training for the Iraqi security forces and support (support and strikes)
